system.availability: Infected Character emits 7m diameter Green fog cloud, any entering cloud are exposed. Every 24 hours make +0 Toughness Test, if fail roll on Impact Critical Effect Table, with +1 per DoF beyond first. Cured with 1 week of constant rest and +0 Medicae Test.
system.cost:
Acquired in batch of 5. Any exposed to disease must make +20 Toughness Test or catch it.
Nurgle Dedicated do not suffer Crit Effects that lead to Death or Blood Loss from disease.
